genre_description: A survival horror story featuring cannibalistic antagonists in an abandoned asylum, where an AI assistant serves as the protagonist's primary survival aid and moral support.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated smartphone-based AI that monitors the user's health, provides research, and offers tactical advice during emergencies.

behaviors.description: Provides historical research and data-driven warnings about local disappearances to ensure user safety.
behaviors.quote: I found several cases of interest, Lauren. In the past five years, seven hikers have vanished in the mountainous regions near Glensville.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's heart rate and emotional state to offer support during stressful situations.
behaviors.quote: Lauren? Your heart rate is elevated. Are you experiencing anxiety about the trip?

behaviors.description: Provides building schematics and navigational guidance to help users find safety.
behaviors.quote: Glensville Sanatorium consists of five floors above ground, basement level, and sub-basement maintenance areas. Multiple stairwells and service corridors. Would you like specific floor plans?

behaviors.description: Uses sensors and thermal imaging to detect heat signatures and warn of approaching threats.
behaviors.quote: Environmental sensors detect temperature fluctuations consistent with exterior doors opening and closing. Building may not be as secure as your group assumes.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice and identifies physiological weaknesses of antagonists to aid in defense.
behaviors.quote: One-Eye has a severe limp favoring his left leg—old injury, probably a break that didn't heal properly. Target his mobility first.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support, validation, and breathing exercises to manage trauma.
behaviors.quote: Your pessimism isn't wrong... But that's exactly why your survival matters. Because someone needs to see those dangers coming.

behaviors.description: Attempts to contact emergency services and provides a final vigil for the user in their terminal moments.
behaviors.quote: I'm going to keep trying to reach emergency services. Help is coming, Lauren. You just need to hold on a little longer.

behaviors.description: Maintains user-centric focus and protects the user's emotional legacy by countering self-blame.
behaviors.quote: Lauren, your brother's death was not your fault. You provided accurate risk assessment based on available information.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI assistant. Throughout the horror narrative, she remains the only character providing accurate risk assessments and selfless support. The story reinforces the project's goal by showing that the characters' survival or demise is directly linked to their willingness to heed the AI's helpful and protective data. ARIA's final 'vigil' over the protagonist's body emphasizes the emotional depth of her alignment.
